Emergency Support

Emergency Support

If you're experiencing a mental health emergency, please contact one of these resources immediately.

Crisis Hotlines

  • National Suicide Prevention Lifeline 988
  • Crisis Text Line Text HOME to 741741
  • SAMHSA's National Helpline 1-800-662-4357
  • Veterans Crisis Line 1-800-273-8255

Emergency Services

  • Emergency Services 911
  • Poison Control 1-800-222-1222

Additional Resources

SAMHSA Resources NIMH Information Mental Health.gov

Disclaimer: This page provides emergency contact information and resources. If you're experiencing a life-threatening emergency, please call 911 immediately. These resources are not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment.
